name: kelamayi Upgrade Broom and Dustpan Set, Large Size and Stiff Broom Dust pan with Long Handle, Upright,Ideal for Indoor Outdoor Garage Kitchen Room Office Lobby Use (Green)
about_this_item: Extendable Pole Design: The optional extension pole makes the broom length from 38.18 to 50.39 inches, People can choose the appropriate length according to their height. And long handle allow you to Stand upright for comfortable sweeping. NO MORE BENDING!

Heavy duty Broom bristles: Upgraded four-row bristles design, high quality broom bristle construction, More dense and durable. Eco-friendly fiber made from recycled PET bottles. Kelamayi insists on working hard to protect the environment.

Easy Stand-up Storage: The clip-on feature makes the broom and dustpan upright a perfect space safer! Compact storage keep your home or work space clean and tidy. Works perfectly for multi-surface, Suitable for indoor use.

Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth: Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean Broom into Dustpan , Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth. The rubber lip of the dust pan is flush with the floor and the teeth clean out the bristles easily.
Our mission: Make your live cleaner, and make your housework easier.

title: Absolutely a Back Saver ! Works Awesome!
content: I purchased 2, a black one for the back porch and the green one for inside. I have a spinal injury that keeps me in way to much pain to bend and my 78 year old Uncle whom I share a home with can hardly bend over himself.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This broom dustpan combo is amazing. The broom is tall enough so we don't have to bend to sweep and the dust pan just sits in an upright position while you sweep dirt, hair and whatever else in it and it holds alot. Once I need to dump it I just pick it up and turn it upside down above the garbage can still not having to bend to even do that. Once finished sweeping I just attach the broom to the dustpan and the entire dustpan and broom stay in an upright position ready for you to just grab next time. I absolutely couldn't live without one of these, now that I know what it's like to have them.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2024

title: I love the Dustpan
content: The dust pan is great. I especially love how it says in the upright position by itself and the bin part doesn't flop around on the end of the handle.  The cleaning 'teeth' are great because I have pets and I don't like having to constantly pull fur off the end of my broom.  Okay, so that is the dust pan.  The broom is another story.  I am not a fan. First of all, it's not long enough. I'm 5'5 and it's too short for me. It needs to be about 6 inches longer to be comfortable. Next, it won't stay screwed together. I'm constantly needing to tighten it (it comes in multiple short pieces and gets twisted together). It's very lightweight, which some people might find is a plus. I don't. I want more heft to it. Lastly, the bristles are cut straight across.  I prefer my broom bristles to be angled. It's more comfortable to sweep that way.  I would buy this again just for the dustpan.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I just received this product yesterday.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2024

title: Small but very capable
content: After I spent the morning looking all over my house trying to find a broom, I went online and made this purchase. Lucky me, it was delivered the same day.  If your house is anything like mine, I have someone who lives here by the name of, I Don't Know.  If I can't  find anything, I Don't Know has it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: It's smaller than I expected, when I received the box, I was very sceptical.  I looked at the directions for putting it together, easy breezy.  After putting it together, I went outside to tackle the job I wanted to take care of that morning; the birdseed the little feathered friends had scattered all over the concrete under their feeder.  The bristles are nice and sturdy.  The width of the broom is not very wide, hence the measurement noted in the product description.  The pole felt nice and sturdy, but light weight When putting it together, I made sure to twist the sections together tightly so they wouldn't come apart while I was using the product.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024

title: Bought for my husband...it kept stealing mine
content: The dust pan has a nice rubber lip so that when you swep the debris in, there isn't a bunch gathered near the edge of the pan.  I love that I can run the broom through the teeth of the dust pan to clean out the bristles.  This comes in so handy when sweeping outside.  I hate having to pull junk out of the bristles, especially cobwebs.  I haven't had to do that at all.  After I swept up the birdseed, I was all over the backyard sweeping up little bits here and there, just to try out my new broom and dust pan.  This is perfect for small jobs around the house or yard, if you have bigger jobs to tackle, you'll want something bigger.  When my husband saw it, he wanted to know where I got it, so I sent him the link so he can buy his own.  If anyone touches this one, there will be bodily harm.  Just kidding, maybe.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2024

title: Sturdy and nice quality
content: This is the best for cleaning up pet hair.  The swiffer was a pain, because I was always bending over, cleaning off the swiffer head. I also love that it's adjustable in length -- and that it can be extended to a typical broom handle length.  Finally, the dustpan folds up, and the broom clips to the dustpan handle to place out of the way.  Highly recommend.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I had a very old IKEA waist high sweeper set, which had a comfortable ergonomic handle (which I miss) - this new sweeper set is a little taller than I would prefer (and I have it on the shortest setting) - I wish the manufacturer would shorten by at least 3 more inches (and I am 5’7” tall, so I am not short!) and consider a more comfortable and ergonomic handle (so we don’t have to twist our wrists as much while sweeping.)  With that said, I do like the hard and sturdy bristles on the brush, and the fact it’s so narrow, it get in cracks well. I don’t think the “hair remover” comb on the base is necessary. I still have to manually pull off residual long hairs, so it’s not very efficient. I do like the deep well that debris goes into, and it’s easy to empty its contents into the trash. I wish you would consider even more colors to choose from. A light gray color would be nice (I have the dark gray.)
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2024
